item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Young women are starting to leave men behind
2. Amazon says workers need to be in the office. Most of Silicon Valley disagrees.
3. UK government borrowing overshoots in blow to Reeves
4. Israel strikes Lebanese targets as Hizbollah chief warns of ‘red lines’ crossed
5. Nike shares jump after sportswear maker replaces chief executive
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
